alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Coleman; Runnels; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 11:13PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Callahan, northern Coleman, Taylor and northern Runnels Counties through MIDNIGHT CST... At 1112 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lawn, moving northeast at 60 mph. Other strong storms will approach Wingate and Winters. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Winters, Baird, Maverick, Wylie, Tye, Cross Plains, Tuscola, Buffalo Gap, Lawn, Novice, Putnam, Dudley, Bradshaw, Rowden, Caps, Dyess Afb, Atwell and Eula. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 277 and 322. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for west central Texas.
